content.name: ArgonMatt's Paranid Agamemnon - XL Battleship
content.description:
[h1] XL battleship for the Godrealm of the Paranid, Holy order of the Pontifex and the Paranid Trinity [/h1] Available for purchase from the shipyard in Trinity Sanctum III and Holy Vision. To install the mod, simply hit the green 'Subscribe' button.
[b] [u] If you enjoy the mod, please leave a positive rating. (thumbs up) [/u] [/b] It helps the mod reach 5 stars and be recommended to more people that might like it, thanks!
[b] [u] The mod is, of course, free. However, if you'd like to support me, you can tip me at: https://ko-fi.com/argonmatt [/u] [/b]
[h1] Credit [/h1] A massive thank you to the Egosoft X4 modding discord community that helped make this ship possible, you guys are the real MVPs!
[h1] Ship Equipment Slots [/h1] [list] [*] 2x XL Engines [*] 2x XL Shield Generators [*] 2x L Paranid Main Batteries [*] 22x L Turrets [*] 22x M Turrets [*] 2x M Landing Pad (2x M Internal Storage) [*] 8x S Landing Pads (40x S Internal Storage) [/list]
The Agamemnon is currently balanced for the VANILLA version of X4: Foundations. Balance subject to change.
[h1] AI Support [/h1] AI Support has been added for the Godrealm of the Paranid, Holy order of the Pontifex and the Paranid Trinity to dynamically create patrol ships that will stay in their space.
[h1] VRO [/h1] The VRO version of this ship is already included in the most recent VRO patch. The Agamemnon has been renamed to 'Deimos' in the VRO version.
[h1] Known Issues [/h1] Currently no known issues.
I'm happy to answer any questions you have about the ship in the comments section, thanks for viewing! :-)
content.author: Matt
